data.title: They serve breakfast
data.text:
I went at the breakfast hour, but didn't feel like the normal breakfast food.
Decided to get steak sandwich and it was delicious.  The bread is always
so fresh.

data.title: Nothing special
data.text: It seems like all subways have the same menu. It was just a sandwich with choices of veggies. They limit all the meat and you barely taste it. Bread is fresh sometimes. If you toast it then it won't taste stale. Now I much prefer Publix subs. They are loaded with fresh Boars head meat and plenty of it! They are right in town and around noon you wait in line! Excellent ...

data.title: PORT ST LUCIE HUNGRY PLACES.
data.text: One of the best place in town when your hungry. Clean place, service up to the top no waiting line more than a minute

data.title: great food anytime
data.text: service is always good and staff always friendly All choices for subs are always available. They have different special subs periodically which are great for a change of pace. Good place to go for any meal of the day.

data.title: great parking, easy access from main road.
data.text: Fast service and very fresh ingredients.  My favorite is the Italian sub and tuna sub.  Fresh cookies are to die for.

data.title: its a subway
data.text: subway is a subway pretty much all the same tuna fresh at this one its as good as any fast food can be clean quick and out the door.

data.title: Sandwiches and Prices are Good Along with Quick Service
data.text: I have picked up sandwiches here a few times and they have been good with reseasonable prices, convenient location and pretty quick service, which is all you can really ask for in a fast food type of restaurant.

data.title: Subway Chips out of date
data.text: The sandwich is always really good there and the pricing has really come down so most families can enjoy a quick bite to eat.  BUT the issue I had is I was in a hurry and picked up 3 bags of chips and not realizing until I was on the road (turnpike) not going to turn around.  MAKE SURE YOU CHECK THE EXPIRATION DATE ON THE BAGS.  I Would be okay with chips being out of date by 2 or 3 days.  But all 3 bags were out of date by over 90 days  (NINETY DAYS PEOPLE)  hey somebody at subway move the older product to the front and fill from the back...also check your dates people !

user_location.name: Port Saint Lucie, Florida, United States

data.title: if its close
data.text: If you are going to the beach and subway is on your way--go for it. But if you like a tastier sandwich with more meat, you can find much better places. They are what they are- convenient at times, but not a place to go out of your way for

data.title: Convenient location
data.text: Great to see that the 'mentally challenged' are given an opportunity to prepare food and operate a cash register.

data.title: Average even for Subway
data.text:
Subway's marketing campaign encourages you to eat fresh but I find the ingredients to be more fresh at competing sub chains like Jimmy Johns and Quiznos.  And the food never looks anywhere near as good as in the pictures.

That being said it is a good option for a healthier lunch when in a rush and a budget.  

This particular location is average and in needs of some sprusing up to make it more appealing.  It was in need of cleaning but since it was a single employee present I witnessed her making very little progress as a new customer would walk in every time she would start to clean again.
